rows.name: CHOICE_COMPACT_MODE
rows.description: Compact choice list to reduce cognitive overload when many choices exist.

rows.description: Strictly enforce requiredState in dev/test and staged rollouts (opt-in).

rows.description: Enable scarcity economy (focus points) to shape tradeoffs and pacing.

rows.description: Ranking algorithm selection for staged rollout.
